title: Help identifying typeface used in "Blue Moon" beer logo...
content:
Hey, can anybody identify the main font used in the Blue Moon beer logo?  
Here's a link to the logo: [http://www.crestpacificbeach.com/Images/Crest%20Liquor\_Beer\_Blue%20Moon.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150410092533/http:/www.crestpacificbeach.com/Images/Crest%20Liquor_Beer_Blue%20Moon.jpg "http://www.crestpacificbeach.com/Images/Crest%20Liquor\_Beer\_Blue%20Moon.jpg") Thanks!
author: Carl Lewis

comments.content:
I think this started life as Beaufort, probably the bold condensed weight. Obviously, several of the characters (B, M) were customized.

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/beaufort/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150410092533/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/beaufort/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/shinn/beaufort/")
